{"blocks":[{"key":"f196f","text":"Do not heat the stock solution bottle. This concentrates it over time and it takes ages to heat. Instead, pour out the desired amount into a beaker and heat carefully in the microwave.  Use low or medium power and stop as it begins to boil or even just before. The agar will look slightly less clear if you don't boil it, but this does not matter.
